All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AIState  
    Bar
    Facilitates drawing UI bars to the screen, e.g a health-bar.
    ChooseCollegeDisplay  
    College
    Represents the physical location of a college on a map.
    CollegeManager  
    DebugUtil
    A collection of tools to help in the debugging process.
    Entity
    To be used for any object in the world that moves or is interactable
    EntityAIShip
    A simple AI ship that circles around the player.
    EntityCannonball
    Cannonballs do damage to other entities that can be damaged.
    EntityShip  
    GameScreen
    Handles game controls, rendering, and logic
    ICannonCarrier
    Defines what an object with cannons should be able to do
    IDamageable
    A collection of methods to allow objects to be damaged.
    InstructionOverlay  
    IRepairable
    Similar to a damageable object but it can also be repaired
    LoadScreen  
    LossScreen
    The screen that shows up when the player's health reaches 0
    MenuScreen
    The menu screen
    Minimap
    Draws a Minimap to the screen to help the player navigate.
    PerlinNoiseGenerator
    Based on the Perlin Noise algorithm by Ken Perlin, specifically the method described here: https://adrianb.io/2014/08/09/perlinnoise.html
    You can view the original algorithm as described by Perlin here: https://mrl.cs.nyu.edu/~perlin/paper445.pdf
    PirateGame  
    ResourceUtil
    Handles texture access
    SoundManager
    Manages playing sounds/music, adjusting volume, muting e.t.c
    TileType
    The different tiles that can be in the world
    VictoryScreen
    The screen that shows up when all rival colleges have been defeated
    VoronoiNoiseGenerator Deprecated.
    World  
    WorldMap
